name: wp max social widget
author: Ramandeep Singh

sections.description:
WP Max Social Wigdet : wordpress Social widget having most of the social icon and social bookmarking option .Wp max social widget reside on the sidebar of the wordpress.having social links like : g+,facebook,pinterest,twitter,news feed subscription,dribbble,vimeo,digg,stumbleupon and more.

Version = 1.3.2 =
1.Minor bug Fix

Version = 1.3 =

1.You tube Added.

2.Footer Show/hide Options Added.

Version = 1.2 =

1.Minor Bug Fixed

Version = 1.1 =

1.Adjustable Facebook Subscribe Width/height .
2.Advanced Twitter Options:-
* Show/hide username button ,Show/Hide Bubble

Installation Guide:

1.Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it.

2.Goto your Appearance>Widgets and then Edit its data as per requirement.

More Details & Support

  • Homepage : Web devlopment Tutorials

  • Support Thread: WordPress Social Plugin

  • Fb Page : http://www.facebook.com/designaeon

  • Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/designaeon

  • Subscribe : Subscribe FREE

  • G+ Page : Design Aeon On Google Plus

More Details & Support

1.Homepage http://www.designaeon.com

2.Plugin page http://www.designaeon.com/wp-max-social-widget

3.Fb Page http://www.facebook.com/designaeon

4.Twitter http://www.twitter.com/designaeon

5.Feeds http://feeds.feedburner.com/designaeon

6.G+ Page https://plus.google.com/107775935805285788668
sections.installation:
1.Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it.

2.Goto your Appearance>Widgets and then Edit its data as per requirement.

That it your plugin will work fine. I hope you enjoy the plugin.
sections.faq:
How To Install This Plugin.

Ans. Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it.Goto your Appearance>Widgets and then Edit its data as per requirement.
